questions.text:
Purpose: You are a student giving an academic presentation. You aim to inform the audience of the dangers of Greenwashing.

Options:

  • Many companies could be overstating their environmental credentials.
  • Companies are scamming you, and the facts prove it.
  • So companies trick people into thinking they’re eco-friendly? No surprises there then!

Purpose: You are on social media. You aim to get as many likes as you can on your post.

Options:

  • This car is insane! It glides like a butterfly, but stings like a BMW! You need this!
  • This car could become hugely successful due to a comfortable ride and top speed of 180kph.
  • Recent reviews have named this car as the next big thing. This time I might believe them.

Purpose: You want parents to stop giving young children mobile phones immediately.

Options:

  • Parents should think carefully before handing out devices.
  • Electronic devices are actively harming our children. We must put a stop to this.
  • Long exposure to digital media may be contributing to delayed language development in pre-school children.

Purpose: You want to emphasize the large number of social media advertisements we see.

Options:

  • So apparently everyone’s checking out 8 ads on social media ads for breakfast?
  • Studies show the average person sees 8 social media adverts before leaving the house.
  • Studies show we are exposed to at least 8 social media ads before we even leave the house.

Purpose: You aim to inform viewers of a new idea without heavy criticism.

Options:

  • Micro-influencers may have significant effect in niche markets.
  • Micro-influencers are the only marketing strategy that works.
  • Micro-influencers aren’t so ‘micro’ after all.

Purpose: You want to promote your company’s environmental efforts professionally, without exaggeration.

Options:

  • It’s official. We’ve gone green!
  • Act now or the environment will suffer. Our company is leading the fight for the planet.
  • Our environmental focus has made real, sustainable changes.
